description:
cmd/gc: don't believe that variables mentioned 256 times are unused.

Such variables would be put at 0(SP), leading to serious
corruptions at zero initialization.
Fixes issue 3084.

Such variables would be put at 0(SP), leading to serious
corruptions at zero initialization.
Fixes issue 3084.
